product_name: Goal Zero Firefly USB LED Light
long_description: Bendable to any angle, the Goal Zero Firefly USB light illuminates your tent in the backcountry or your workspace at home, utilizing any USB power source. Couple the Firefly with the Goal Zero Switch 8 portable recharger or Guide 10 Plus battery pack (sold separately) for a versatile, easily portable light source. Removable cover snaps off to convert from a task light (60 lumens) to a flood light (80 lumens). The Goal Zero Firefly USB light comes with blue, red and green lenses.
short_description: Bendable to any angle, the Goal Zero Firefly USB light illuminates your tent in the backcountry or your workspace at home, utilizing any USB power source.
